vicedtools.workflows package

Submodules

vicedtools.workflows.compassreportstobq module

Executable script for uploading compass reports to BigQuery.

vicedtools.workflows.compassstudentdetailstobq module

Executable script for uploading compass student details to BigQuery.

vicedtools.workflows.compassstudentdetailstobq.compass_student_details_to_bq(table_id, bucket, student_details_csv, save_file='')

Imports student details to BQ from Compass student details export.

Parameters

  • table_id – The BQ table id for the enrolments data

  • bucket – A GCS bucket for temporarily storing the csv for import into BQ.

  • student_details_csv – The path to the Compass student details csv.

  • save_file – Optionally, save the student details csv to this path.

vicedtools.workflows.compassstudentenrolmenttobq module

Executable script for uploading compass enrolment details to BigQuery.

vicedtools.workflows.compassstudentenrolmenttobq.compass_student_enrolments_to_bq(table_id, bucket, sds_dir, save_file='')

Imports student enrolments to BQ from Compass SDS export.

Parameters

  • table_id – The BQ table id for the enrolments data

  • bucket – A GCS bucket for temporarily storing the csv for import into BQ.

  • sds_dir – The directory containing the Compass SDS export.

  • save_file – Optionally, save the uploaded csv to this path.

vicedtools.workflows.ewritesittingstoscores module

Executable script for creating a table of student eWrite scores.

vicedtools.workflows.ewritesittingstoscores.ewrite_sittings_to_scores(oars_tests_json, ewrite_sittings_dir, ewrite_scores_csv, ewrite_criteria_csv)

Creates summary tables from eWrite sittings data.

Creates two tables, a scores table that provides the overall score achieved but the student for each sitting and a per-criteria table that provides the scale score achieved for each criteria for each sitting.

vicedtools.workflows.exportcompassreportcycles.export_compass_report_cycles(school_code, authenticator, file_name)

Exports metadata for Compass report cycles to a json file.

Parameters

  • school_code – The compass school string. E.g. https://{school_code}.compass.education

  • authenticator – An instance of CompassAuthenticator.

  • file_name – The file name to save the json data to

vicedtools.workflows.exportoarsmetadata module

vicedtools.workflows.exportoarssittings module

Executable script for exporting PAT sitting data from OARS.

vicedtools.workflows.exportoarssittings.export_oars_sittings(from_date, to_date, school_code, authenticator, pat_sittings_dir='.')

Exports completed PAT Sittings and saves them in sittings.json.

Parameters

  • from_date – The start date to download results for in dd-mm-yyyy format.

  • to_date – The end date to download results for in dd-mm-yyyy format.

  • school_code – An OARS school string. E.g. https://oars.acer.edu.au/{your school string}/…

  • authenticator – An instance of OARSAuthenticator.

  • pat_sittings_dir – The directory to save the sittings data in.

vicedtools.workflows.gwsc-config module

vicedtools.workflows.naplanoutcomestobq module

Executable script for uploading NAPLAN outcomes BigQuery.

vicedtools.workflows.naplanoutcomestobq.naplan_outcomes_to_bq(table_id, bucket, naplan_outcomes_dir, combined_file='')

Merges NAPLAN outcomes exports and uploads a combined table to Bigquery.

Parameters

  • table_id – The BQ table id for the NAPLAN data

  • bucket – A GCS bucket for temporarily storing the csv for import into BQ.

  • naplan_outcomes_dir – The folder containing the outcomes exports.

  • combined_file – If provided, save a csv containing the merged outcomes to this filename.

vicedtools.workflows.patmostrecentobq module

Executable script for uploading a table of student’s most recent PAT results to BigQuery.

vicedtools.workflows.patmostrecentobq.pat_most_recent_to_bq(table_id, bucket, scores_file)

Imports most recent PAT results table to BQ.

Parameters

  • table_id – The BQ table id for the enrolments data

  • bucket – A GCS bucket for temporarily storing the csv for import into BQ.

  • scores_file – The path to the PAT most recent scores csv.

vicedtools.workflows.patscorestobq module

Executable script for uploading student’s PAT scores to BigQuery

vicedtools.workflows.patscorestobq.pat_scores_to_bq(table_id, bucket, scores_file)

Imports PAT scores table to BQ.

Parameters

  • table_id – The BQ table id for the enrolments data

  • bucket – A GCS bucket for temporarily storing the csv for import into BQ.

  • scores_file – The path to the PAT scores csv.

vicedtools.workflows.patscorestomostrecent module

Executable script for creating a summary of student’s most recent PAT scores.

vicedtools.workflows.patscorestomostrecent.pat_scores_to_most_recent(pat_scores_csv, pat_most_recent_csv)

Creates a summary table with only the most recent PAT results.

Creates a wide table with columns for reading and maths.

Parameters

  • pat_scores_csv – The location of the pat scores csv.

  • pat_most_recent_csv – The locatoin to save the summary.
